snippet.title: Breast, Postsurgical : Article by Lisa Forrest Baron, MD
snippet.description: Breast, Postsurgical : Article by Lisa Forrest Baron, MD Breast, Postsurgical - The purpose of this article is to review the postsurgical imaging findings observed on mammogram, ultrasound, and MRI images.Accurate interpretation of the images depends on the availability of high-quality pictures, as well as pertinent medical and surgical breast history. Many findings can be mistaken for cancer. Skin thickening, architectural distortion, and other indicators of malignancy can be seen in both malignant and benign conditions. Prior breast surgery, trauma, and breast conservation treatment (BCT; lumpectomy) can result in ...

snippet.title: Tackling cancer in England : saving more lives
snippet.description: Tackling cancer in England : saving more lives This report reviews NHS cancer services in England, looking in particular at survival and mortality rates, and has been prepared by the National Audit Office as part of a broad review of cancer services.
